data.title: How to purchase a United States postal service zip code database
data.meta_description: ZipCodeDownload provides the Highest rated, Most trusted Zip Code list. You can purchase our extremely accurate USA and Canada commercial-grade Zip Code database in a few clicks. Immediate download.
data.text:
If you're looking for a comprehensive database of US zip codes, the best place to start is with the Zipcodedownload.com United States Postal Service (USPS zip code data products).

The Zipcodedownload website offers a variety of different zip code databases that you can purchase, depending on your needs.

So how exactly do I go about purchasing a United States postal service zip code database?

Zipcodedownload has been the #1 zip code data provider partner of the USPS since 2002. Over 50,000+ companies world wide rely on Zipcodedownload to provide accurate and up to data zip code data.

The most basic option is the five-digit zip code database, which includes all U.S. zip codes and their associated city names. This database is available in multiple formats, and pricing starts at $39.95.

For more detailed information, Zipcodedownload also offers a nine-digit zip code database. This database includes additional information such as time zones, county names, and latitude/longitude coordinates plus many more geo data related information.

Pricing for this database starts at $99.95.The issue with the USPS zip code database that you could buy at the USPS website is the lack of geo data. If you want to know the distance between two zip codes, or find all zip codes within a certain radius, you'll need to purchase a separate geo data add-on.

This starts at $149.99 and goes up from there, depending on the size and scope of the geo data you need. You'll also have to import and implement the data into whatever format you might need. You can save money and time by purchasing the USPS data from Zipcodedownload.com.

You need Canadian postal codes as well, we recommend the Zipcodedownload.com Postal Code Database. This database includes over 2 million Canadian postal codes, along with latitude/longitude coordinates and other useful information. Pricing for this database starts at $99.95.

No matter which option you choose, make sure you purchase a regularly updated zip code database to ensure the most accurate information possible.

Why is it important to get monthly updates for your USPS Zip Code Database?

The USPS zip code database is one of the most important data files for any business that ships products via USPS. A good zip code database will provide the latest information on changes to zip codes, new zip codes, and discontinuations of old ones.

It's essential to have this information in order to ensure that your products are shipped correctly and efficiently.Additionally, a monthly update service ensures that you always have the most accurate information possible.

The USPS makes changes to zip codes on a regular basis, and these changes can impact your business if you're not aware of them. With a monthly update service, you can be confident that your zip code database is always up-to-date.

Zipcodedownload.com also provides a Zip Code API service, which gives you programmatic access to our zip code data. This is perfect for businesses that need to automate their shipping processes. With the API, you can easily get zip code information directly from our website.

Our zip code databases are available in a variety of formats, making it easy to integrate them into your existing systems. Choose from CSV, Excel, or MySQL format, or take advantage of our custom integration services.

No matter what your needs are, we have a zip code database solution that will fit your business perfectly. Contact us today to learn more about our products and services!
